items.sentence: Tom accidentally cut his hand when he was slicing carrots.
Tom and Mary have been married for more than thirty years.
Tom sold the farm after Mary died and went back to Boston.
Tom speaks French so badly that he is often misunderstood.
Tom spoiled the movie for Mary by telling her how it ends.
Tom still studies French every evening for thirty minutes.
Tom suddenly slammed on the brakes to avoid hitting a dog.
What mountain do you think is the second highest in Japan?
When we were kids, Tom and I did a lot of things together.
With your children away, you must have a lot of free time.
If God did not exist, it would be necessary to invent him.
Tom and Mary got married three years after they first met.
Tom and Mary got married when they were both 30 years old.
Tom won\'t admit it, but he\'s secretly in love with Mary.
Ever since Tom passed away, things haven\'t been the same.
He has absolutely no respect for other people\'s feelings.
Tom is not a lazy boy. As a matter of fact, he works hard.
Tom hadn\'t expected Mary to come so early in the morning.
If there\'s anything I can do for you, please let me know.
If there\'s anything I can do to help, please let me know.
